document_data.name: ''Thunderpalm Strikers''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Thunderpalm Strikers''''' were [[enchanted]] [[monk]] gloves that discharged a thunderclap with each strike.
document_data.Powers: When used in unarmed combat, each successful attack with ''Thunderpalm Strikers'' produced a thunderous damage that sounded like a "rumbling boom of a thousand demons' ravenous stomachs." Additionally, the wearer could cast the ''[[thunderwave]]'' [[spell]] once per day.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, a pair of ''Thunderpalm Strikers'' was sold by merchant [[Bumpnagel]] of the [[Clan Ironhand]], a [[deep gnome]] clan of [[artificer]]s from [[Baldur's Gate]].
